root: ^Oh.. Hello there little one... what brings a morsel like you to this Tavern?

g-0: ^Call me Agatha my dear, a Bard you said? are you actually a bard or one of those silly minstrels that come through
g-1: ^Just Agatha my dear, now what did you want to discuss?

s: ^What are you? you seam to draw the light to you while staying cloaked in shadows...
^I like your staff, whats it made of?

c-2: ^What brings you here of all places? forgicve me you seam.. more than this place.

Magic: ^ha ha... I am a Witch my little Bard one who has travelled over these lands and learnt its secrets.

g-1: ^mmmh... yes, and no you see alot of what can be learned must be learnt from the source, other wise it wont work properly. i could teach you a few parlour tricks but its much better to learn on your own.

s: ^Can you tell me of your travels then?

g-2: ^of course little one, but im afraid my mug has run dry and i must fetch another, come back latter and i will tell you the wonderous places i have seen.

Family: ^I suppose it does,little one but one thing you must remember is that family comes before anything, my Uncle, Jon runs this Tavern and i like to drop by on occasion to check up on him he has been so lonely since my aunt passed away.

g-1: ^you needent worry my dear but you must excuse me as i require another Ale.

Staff: ^its fasioned from the branch of an oak who saw the birth and death of a dragon some 3500 years ago now run along i need to talk to my Uncle
